Label.Text: Copy/Paste or drag two or more molecules into the same msketch window to align them.
Both flexible and rigid alignment is available.
By default molecular conformation is free to change.
To preserve the original input conformation simply select the molecule.
Use reaction mapping arrow to define optional atompairs.

Choice.ToolTip: Force field atomtypes are applied to align molecules. Atoms with similar types are tried to overlay.
Use H-bond donor acceptor aromatic and hydrophobic and +, - charges.
The atom-atom pairing is obtained from the maximum common substructure. Alignment by extended atom types is applied on the non MCS atoms.

Number.Label: Initial conformation count
Number.ToolTip: Flexible alignment is launched all of these conformations.

Number.Label: Common scaffold minimum size
Number.ToolTip: Minimum number of atoms that are required for the maximum common substructure calculation prior to the alignment.
